title.rendered: The International F. Chopin Piano Competition

content.rendered: Founded in 1927, the International F. Chopin Piano Competition is one of the oldest and most prestigious events of its kind. Held every five years in Warsaw, Poland, the competition attracts some of the most accomplished young pianists from around the world. Past winners have included Maurizio Pollini, Martha Argerich, Garrick Ohlsson, Krystian Zimerman, Dang Thai Son, Yundi Li, Rafal Blechacz and Yulianna Avdeeva. The 17th International F. Chopin Competition will be held from October 1-21, 2015.
